description: Lists the configuration policies that the Security Hub delegated administrator has created for your organization. Only the delegated administrator can invoke this operation from the home Region.

nested_items.name: ConfigurationPolicySummaries
nested_items.description: Provides metadata for each of your configuration policies.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the configuration policy.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The universally unique identifier (UUID) of the configuration policy.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the configuration policy. Alphanumeric characters and the following ASCII characters are permitted: -, ., !, *, /.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the configuration policy.

nested_items.name: UpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time, in UTC and ISO 8601 format, that the configuration policy was last updated.

nested_items.name: ServiceEnabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the service that the configuration policy applies to is enabled in the policy.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The NextToken value to include in the next ListConfigurationPolicies request. When the results of a ListConfigurationPolicies request exceed MaxResults, this value can be used to retrieve the next page of results. This value is null when there are no more results to return.
